javascript.value:
document.querySelector('.SiteLayout__main').innerHTML = '
I am honored to nominate bright young men and women from Connecticut as candidates to the U.S. Military, Naval, Air Force and Merchant Marine Academies.

Please visit my Academy Nominations page.

I am happy to help if you are having an issue with a federal agency. Please visit my Help with a Federal Agency page.

Help with a Federal Agency

If you would like me to write a letter of condolence to a Connecticut resident, please visit my Special Recognitions page.

Special Recognitions

If you are interested in learning more about internships in one of my offices, please visit my Internships page.

Internships

If you are visiting DC and need help with a tour, please use my Visiting DC page.

Visiting DC

Your Contact Information
Your Message

Fewer than 10,000 characters

Would you like to know when I’m near your area holding a town hall or community event?
'
